1: <pb/><e>Is bit David chi bitnelay yet chi ajtok eb israel bay Jerusalén.</e> <pb/><t>Ilek wali, jantakxa wal watx'il chaon ba yayji ec' eb yuẍtakc'al ba, eb yanabc'al ba yin junej.</t>
2: <t>Lajan yetok jun perfume watx' tol axac'al ocok, max toj jililok yin jolom cham sacerdote Aarón, cax max ayol yin xil is ti'. Max ayapnok yin nuk' is jokan pichil.</t>
3: <t>Lajan axca wal yal ak'bal chi ay bay jolom witz Hermón, cax chi ay c'ay yiban tzalanlak yet Sión. A bay ay junc'ulal tu' chi yatok Jehová is watx'c'ulalil, a ton k'inalej tol c'am is lajub.</t>
